metadata.synopsis: After the killing of Cora and Roger because Dolor can perform the complete ritual (flag LOW_SerialKiller_State_HighberrysRitualPerformed_00c1e2ab-8752-47f1-b847-51aedc0fb189), a crowd of people will be outside the house. This one of the only AD for that crowd, along the one in the Flaming Fist.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Stay near S_LOW_SerialKiller_WineFestivalCivilian002_4396e623-f09b-4599-91f3-63900a0c3382 if the ritual has been performed.

0.speaker: Jaycen Borgu
0.text: The corpses were mutilated. Did anyone see?

1.speaker: Jaycen Borgu
1.text: How horrific... Cora was always so joyful.
